An error has occurred while trying to create a system notification for a new message. The reason is most likely a missing notification sound.\n\nTap to open notification settings.
Displayed while waiting for new messages
Log sync diagnostic information for 24 hours
Export successful. Logs might contain sensitive information. Be careful who you send them to.
You must add at least one recipient.
No email address could be found for this contact.

The message cannot be forwarded because some attachments have not been downloaded.
Show correspondent names rather than their email addresses

Colorize names in your contact list
Use a fixed-width font when showing plain text messages
Shrink messages to fit the screen
After deleting or moving a message
After marking a message as unread
Show a dialog whenever you perform selected actions
Use UTC instead of local timezone in mail headers and reply header
Disable ringing, buzzing and flashing at night
Completely disable notifications during Quiet Time
Cannot copy or move a message that is not synchronized with the server
Notify in status bar when mail arrives
Notify in status bar while mail is checked
Show a notification for messages I sent
Show notifications only for messages from known contacts
Don\'t show notifications for messages belonging to an email chat
Mark a message as read when it is opened for viewing
Mark a message as read when it is deleted
Include the original message in your reply.
The original message will appear above your reply.
Signatures will be removed from quoted messages
Upload messages to Sent folder after sending
All drafts will be stored encrypted
Encrypt drafts only if encryption is enabled
The accent color of this account used in folder and account list
Remove messages when deleted on server

Set your default From, Bcc and signature
Set up alternate \'From\' addresses and signatures

Select the message view theme while viewing the message
Use a fixed message view theme

This will remove all local messages from the folder. No messages will be deleted from the server.

resources.string: A network connection is required for server search.
A different background will show that the message has been read
Please select a message on the left
Show contact pictures in the message list
Show selected actions in the message view menu
No Drafts folder configured for this account!
No key configured for this account! Check your settings.
Crypto provider uses incompatible version. Please check your settings!
Cannot connect to crypto provider, check your settings or click crypto icon to retry!
Failed to initialize end-to-end encryption, please check your settings
PGP/INLINE mode does not support attachments!
The email is sent in PGP/INLINE format.\nThis should only be used for compatibility:
Some clients only support this format
In this mode, your PGP key will be used to create a cryptographic signature of an unencrypted email.
This does not encrypt the email, but verifies that it was sent from your key.
Signatures may break when sent to mailing lists.
Signatures may be displayed as \'signature.asc\' attachments in some clients.
Encrypted messages always include a signature.
must fully download message to process signature
Message is encrypted, but in an unsupported format.
Message is encrypted, but decryption was cancelled.
but end-to-end key didn\'t match sender
but end-to-end key is not considered secure
but there was a decryption error
must fully download message for decryption
but no crypto app is configured
but end-to-end key didn\'t match sender
but end-to-end key is not considered secure
This part was not encrypted, and may be insecure.
Encrypted message must be downloaded for decryption.
Special characters are currently not supported!
Only encrypted signatures will be displayed
This email has been encrypted with OpenPGP.\nTo read it, you need to install and configure a compatible OpenPGP App.
Some of the selected recipients don\'t support this feature!
Encrypting messages ensures they can be read by the recipient, and nobody else.
Encryption will only show up if supported by all recipients, and they must have sent you an email before.
Toggle encryption by clicking this icon.
Messages will normally be encrypted by choice, or when replying to an encrypted message.
If both sender and recipients enable mutual mode, encryption will be enabled by default.
You can click here to learn more.
The app OpenKeychain is required to enable support for end-to-end encryption.
May not be supported by some recipients
Securely share end-to-end setup with other devices
An Autocrypt Setup Message securely shares your end-to-end setup with other devices.
The message will be sent to your address:
To finish, open the message on your other device and enter the setup code.

This message contains all information to transfer your Autocrypt settings along with your secret key securely from your original device.
To set up your new device for Autocrypt, please follow the instructions that should be presented by your new device.
You can keep this message and use it as a backup for your secret key. If you want to do this, you should write down the password and store it securely.
An error occurred while sending the message. Please check your network connectivity and outgoing server configuration.
An error occurred while loading the data
Sleeping until background sync is allowed
When using Push, %1$s maintains a connection to the mail server. Android requires displaying an ongoing notification while the app is active in the background. %2$s
However, Android also allows you to hide the notification.
If you don\'t need instant notifications about new messages, you should disable Push and use Polling. Polling checks for new mail at regular intervals and does not need the notification.
An error occurred while loading the message details.
Shares performance, usage, hardware and customization data about this app with Mozilla to help us make Thunderbird better
Archiving is not available for this account.
